# automaticallyAdjustsContentInsets

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates if the clip view automatically accounts for other scroll view subviews.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var automaticallyAdjustsContentInsets: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and the clip view is used as the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrollView/contentView] of an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrollView], the clip view automatically accounts for other scroll view subviews, such as rulers and headers. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Accessing the Content Insets

- **contentInsets**: The distance that the content view is inset from the enclosing scroll view.
